title: E185 The Presence of Emothy and a Wine Glass Planchette
description:
May we please introduce you to Emothy, Christopolis and Evatha! For episode 185, we're bringing you some randonauting updates and a sleep over that may or may not have included a Ouija board ambush. Then Em tells the surprisingly recent story of the Chupacabra and Christine covers the heartbreaking and infuriating case of Tamla Horsford. We also attempt to bring you the Chupacabra family tree... and that's why we drink!


Check out Princeton University's research on the Chupacabra here: http://www.princeton.edu/~accion/chupa.html


Listen to the Tamla Horsford 911 call here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s0iCOt8rw9g


Please consider supporting the companies that support us!


Get 10% off your first month with Better Help when you go to www.betterhelp.com/drink


Get that glowy, dewy look for yourself by visiting www.Glossier.com/podcast/DRINK


If you’re a homeowner, head to www.Policygenius.com right now to get started!


Go to www.Thrive.com/drink for a free gift and up to $22 in value!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
